DOC.brief_summary: This is a pilot study and will be used to power an NIH grant application on the effect of resistant starch on weight gain in children.
DOC.brief_title: Horton & Maizy Pilot Study for Resistant to Starch
DOC.detailed_description: Stool fatty acids and stool pH from the baseline and week 4 stool samples will be compared by paired-t test. The stool microflora changes will be reported using descriptive statistics for the percent changes in the different bacterial phyla.
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or female between the ages of 5 and 15 years Gastrointestinal disease Medication such as antibiotics that have the potential for altering the gut bacterial flora. Allergic to milk or corn products.
